posts.post_title: FS: HOFer Fred Clarke portrait SGC 2 ***SOLD***
posts.post_content:
Price is net to me and delivered. SOLD here or via PM trumps any offers or negotiations. 

SGC 2 HOFer Fred Clarke portrait $165. Great centering and fantastic 150 series color and image clarity. Some scuffing on the case as you can see. ***SOLD***

Thanks for looking!

[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52547374047_eb960c0305_c_d.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/52547374022_a65d1abcfc_c_d.jpg[/IMG]
If available I will take this. Lmk. And hope you are doing well my friend.
Sold to you my good friend! Will text you.
